title: What happened to my Victorious Ward skin?
body: I had the Victorious Ward skin for getting into silver in Season 3.. I just patched, started a game, in champ select noticed they added the option to change ward skins so I clicked it.. clicked the regular ward skin and now my victorious ward skin disappeared.. WHERE DID IT GO?? Can't find it in store or anywhere.. I am a sad panda.

replies.body: I also have that problem, but not only victorious wards disappeard. I have bought 4 wards skins and now I have only 2 of them. I have never been banned.

Considering a player support "lead" replied to your thread, I would assume you were banned for boosting/account sharing in the past, and your rewards were stripped. It probably didn't kick in until you switched the skin.

Not a display bug.  

**mahhtiina** - This isn't information we like to share on the boards.  Please submit a ticket here: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

Heya
Have you tried relogging? Could be a display-bug.
If not talk to the support.

Regards Rkoturdo
